title: Italy Crude Oil Production
description: Crude Oil Production in Italy increased to 101 BBL/D/1K in June from 87 BBL/D/1K in May of 2022. Crude Oil Production in Italy averaged 94.72 BBL/D/1K from 1993 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 120 BBL/D/1K in October of 1997 and a record low of 23 BBL/D/1K in July of 2016. This page provides the latest reported value for - Italy Crude Oil Production - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: U.S. Energy Information Administration
